name: "Pump 3 Please!"
description:
Can you man the fuel station overnight, taking payments and fulfilling orders for fuel, drinks and snacks (hot & cold)?.

Locked-in until the sun comes up, will you make it through the entire shift?

Duties include: 
  • Man the till overnight in a fuel station from 10PM - 6AM (Night Shift)
  • Learn how to use the POS (point-of-sale) cashier system to ring up items
  • Take payments in the form of cash and card
  • Taking for fuel (make sure to choose the correct pump)
  • Fetching and making hot drinks with the coffee pod machine (Coffee / Latte's)
  • Warming up hot snacks in the microwave (Pasties / Sausage Rolls / Fries)
  • Processing lottery tickets and scratchcards with the dedicated lottery machine
  • Fetch the correct items from the Refrigerator: (Cola / Fizzy Orange / Milk / Beer..)
  • Multiple Magazines and Newspapers
  • Various combinations to test your memory

Controls:
Mostly Point and Click!
Mouse Wheel Click: Toggle Inventory
Mouse Wheel: Select Next/Previous Item

A Sim-In-Progress
